title: American Airlines Employee Arrested for Bomb Threat at Charlotte Airport
summary: A Gastonia man was arrested after allegedly sending a bomb threat text to a coworker at Charlotte-Douglas International Airport.
charlotte_impact: Highlights security concerns and the serious consequences of making threats against public safety at transportation hubs.

title: York County Residents Sentenced in Drug Conspiracy Case
summary: A group of York County residents received sentences for trafficking methamphetamine and fentanyl in the area, according to federal prosecutors.
charlotte_impact: Addresses the ongoing issue of drug trafficking and its impact on local communities, emphasizing law enforcement efforts.

title: Fort Mill Launches Initiative to Improve School Zone Safety
summary: Fort Mill leaders are initiating a new plan to enhance safety in school zones, emphasizing a community partnership approach.
charlotte_impact: Focuses on proactive measures to protect children and improve pedestrian safety around schools in the Fort Mill area.

title: NCDOT Opens Applications for 2026 Multimodal Planning Program
summary: The NCDOT is accepting applications for the 2026 Multimodal Planning Program, offering benefits to 278 municipalities in North Carolina.
charlotte_impact: Highlights opportunities for municipalities to improve transportation infrastructure and accessibility through state programs.

title: Man Dies After Motorcycle Crash in North Charlotte
summary: Reginald Stowe, 56, died from injuries sustained in a motorcycle crash on West Sugar Creek Road in north Charlotte.
charlotte_impact: Reports on a fatal traffic accident, raising awareness about road safety and the consequences of vehicle crashes.

title: Matthews Sports Pioneer Patsy Neal Honored by Georgia Sports Hall of Fame
summary: Patsy Neal, a trailblazing basketball star from Matthews, is being honored by the Georgia Sports Hall of Fame for her contributions to women's athletics.
charlotte_impact: Celebrates the achievements of a local sports figure and her impact on promoting women's participation in athletics.

title: Landslide Maps' Availability Questioned After Deadly Storm Helene
summary: The availability and awareness of potentially life-saving landslide maps are questioned after deadly landslides triggered by Storm Helene in North Carolina.
charlotte_impact: Addresses the importance of accessible information about natural disaster risks and preparedness measures for residents.

title: Rainy Thursday Expected in Charlotte, Followed by Gorgeous Weekend
summary: Charlotte is expecting widespread rain showers on Thursday, followed by a pleasant weekend.
charlotte_impact: Provides a brief weather forecast, informing residents about expected conditions and upcoming weather changes.

title: Woman Dies in Mobile Home Fire in Alexander County
summary: A woman died in a fire at a mobile home park on Mickey Hager MHP Drive in Stony Point on Thursday morning.
charlotte_impact: Reports on a fatal house fire, highlighting the dangers of residential fires and the importance of fire safety measures.

title: 23 Dogs Seized in Stanly County Animal Cruelty Case
summary: Authorities seized 23 dogs in Stanly County, leading to animal cruelty charges against the dogs' owners for neglect and failure to vaccinate.
charlotte_impact: Addresses animal welfare concerns and the legal consequences of animal cruelty and neglect in Stanly County.

title: 3.0 Earthquake Rattles South Carolina Near Columbia
summary: A magnitude 3.0 earthquake struck near Lake Murray in South Carolina, with over 250 people reporting it within 30 minutes.
charlotte_impact: Reports on a minor earthquake event, providing information about its location and impact on the surrounding area.

title: Firefighters Safe After Being Trapped in Steele Creek House Fire
summary: Two firefighters are reported safe after being briefly trapped while battling a blaze in a Steele Creek home.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the risks faced by firefighters and the importance of safety measures during emergency response operations.

title: South Carolina Hands-Free Ticketing Imminent After Nearly 12,000 Warnings
summary: South Carolina officers issued nearly 12,000 warnings since September; hands-free ticketing begins Feb. 28, with fines for holding phones while driving.
charlotte_impact: Informs drivers about upcoming changes in traffic laws and the enforcement of hands-free driving regulations in South Carolina.

title: Former NASCAR Driver Lists Lake Norman Home for $6.5M
summary: A former NASCAR driver has listed their luxurious Lake Norman home for $6.5 million; the estate features waterfront property, a 5-car garage, and a lavish pool house.
charlotte_impact: Reports on a high-end real estate listing, showcasing luxury properties and attracting attention to the Lake Norman area.

title: Monroe Police Drone Locates Suspect After Anson County Pursuit
summary: Monroe police used a drone with thermal imaging to locate a suspect who fled from a stolen vehicle after a pursuit in Anson County.
charlotte_impact: Demonstrates the use of technology in law enforcement and its effectiveness in apprehending suspects and resolving criminal incidents.
